channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In Their Endless Summer, Time Still Flies
item.description: We can only live vicariously through our children’s experience of these long, hot, languid days.

item.title: Law Enforcement Ignored Dire Threats Against Pennsylvania Trump Voters’ Families, Property, And Pets
item.description: It is outrageous that local, state, federal, and postal authorities apparently did absolutely nothing to investigate what happened.

item.title: Who's calling? A reporter, and it's often President Donald Trump answering
item.description: For reporters, it's hardly unusual to call sources on the phone to learn details or get quotes that will enliven their stories. Sometimes people will ...

item.title: Supreme Court to hear GOP's challenge to political party spending limits
item.description: The Supreme Court will weigh during its next term whether limits on political party spending in coordination with candidates for federal office run af...

item.title: Trump’s Effort To Remove Noncitizens From Census Would Affect Elections
item.description: If the second Trump administration fails to win court approval of its expected effort to exclude illegal migrants from the census, this time around, i...

item.title: Supreme Court takes up a Republican appeal to end limits on party spending in federal elections
item.description: The Supreme Court will take up a Republican-led drive, backed by President Donald Trump's administration, to wipe away limits on how much political pa...

item.title: Christians Are Being Massacred Globally. The U.S. Must Act
item.description: Defenseless Christians in Nigeria and Syria have recently been attacked by extremists intent on purifying those lands for Islam.

item.title: Sen. Bernie Sanders joins push for four-day workweek as AI fuels productivity debate
item.description: Sen. Bernard Sanders says if artificial intelligence can help workers get more done in less time, they should work fewer hours.

item.title: A Real Affordability Agenda
item.description: Contra the beliefs of Zohran Mamdani, the true path to lower prices is not to mandate them.

item.title: Trump condemns Sen. Coons over suggestion he is offering Iran a nuclear deal
item.description: President Trump on Monday panned Sen. Chris Coons for saying the White House is contemplating an agreement with Iran comparable to President Obama's n...

item.title: Jake Tapper Is Paid Millions A Year To Not Know The News
item.description: Just when you think CNN’s Jake Tapper can’t become an even bigger media hack than he already is, he finds a way to prove you wrong. The latest inciden...

item.title: England Codifies A Culture Of Death
item.description: Women will now have more time to abort their children, and everyone will finally have a say in how and when they die.

item.title: Do We Remember How to Be Human to One Another?
item.description: Pope Leo may just save our lives.

item.title: For The First Time In Four Years, Americans Aren’t Paying More For Their July 4 Cookouts
item.description: This year’s total cookout cost is down 30 cents from the record high $71.22 bill calculated in 2024 under Biden.

item.title: Watering Down the SAT Weakens Meritocracy
item.description: If we want a society that truly rewards talent and effort, we must preserve and strengthen the tools that make upward mobility possible.
